channel.title: Elia Kazan on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Jonathan Kaplan, Director of ‘The Accused’ and ‘ER,’ Dies at 77
item.description: The nephew of Van Heflin also helmed ‘Love Field,’ ‘Truck Turner,’ ‘Over the Edge,’ ‘Bad Girls,’ ‘Immediate Family’ and other admired films.
